content.question: In the parenthetical statement in the second paragraph (“she was . . . lackey”), the narrator alludes to past conflict with Reena primarily in order to emphasize that after twenty years, she and Reena

choices.label: are unable to forget past betrayals
are in some ways on more equal footing
have settled into a predictable pattern
have reversed the roles they play in their relationship

content.answer: are in some ways on more equal footing

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the function of conflict in a text.
